授業目的:
英文欄参照/Refer to the following
All 14 sessions are conducted Face-to-face.
到達目標: 英文欄参照/Refer to the following
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業方法:
All classes are expected to be taught face-to-face. Google Classroom will be used for some course information and assignment submissions. Therefore, students will NEED access to a computer at home or use a school computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).

Learners who miss tests and do not have an official absence will not have any opportunity to retake the test.

------
This course is taught in English. Students should communicate with the teacher in English. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

Additionally, this class includes collaboration and regular pairwork. All members are expected to support each other.

第1回:
Orientation and Introduction Course 
overview, teacher introduction, TOEIC 
Introduction, LMS setup
第6回: TOEIC Listening Test Part 4: Short Talks
第8回: TOEIC Reading Test Part 5: Incomplete Sentences
第9回: TOEIC Reading Test Part 6: Text Completion
第10回: TOEIC Reading Test Part 7: Reading Comprehension
トピック.授業計画1: Class sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance to the student needs, any changes to the university calendar, and any changes to the learning environment.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 8% Class effort & improvement, 30% Practice Tests, 30% Final Test, 12% Vocabulary Tests, 20% E-Learning
